faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faqPage.a1: Block Sphere is a gamified mining simulation platform that allows you to earn NTX tokens by purchasing and managing virtual tools.
faqPage.q2: How can I increase my earnings?
faqPage.a2: You can increase your mining rate by purchasing more powerful tools in the 'Upgrade' section. You can also earn bonuses by inviting friends to join your team.
faqPage.a3: NTX is the native token of the Block Sphere platform. You accumulate it through mining and can use it within the app's ecosystem.
faqPage.q4: How does the referral system work?
faqPage.a4: When someone signs up using your invitation code, they join your team. You earn a percentage of your team members' mining activity, spread across several levels.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.p1: We are a passionate team dedicated to blockchain technology and decentralized finance. Our mission with Block Sphere is to create an accessible and fun gateway to the world of cryptocurrencies.
aboutPage.p2: We believe that learning should be an engaging experience, and we have designed this platform to simulate the concepts of mining and rewards in a simple and visual way.

supportPage.title: Customer Support
supportPage.p1: If you have any problems, questions, or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our support team is here to help you.
